topic: Bounce from surface component: how to correlate bounce points and rays

replies.body: Hi Alejandro, maybe not the best solution but you can test closet point to remap them. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/NpAlVAvTs3PUIL5A3dN*59lve4HuwV7dUPFUUrUyVeduM3kyyVYK2FMV-KN1MzZlN3enc3sgWiMCKpWugxxsPagOVuN7jcCc/matchPointsAndRays.png)
